import React, { Component } from 'react'; import CrimeServices from './crimeServices'; class CrimeDetails extends Component { state = { crime: { crime: { 'id':'', 'category_id':'', 'location_type':'', 'latitude':'', 'longitude':'', 'street_name':'', 'persistent_id':'', 'month':'' }, outcomes: [] } } async componentWillMount(){ const crime = await CrimeServices.crimeDetails(this.props.match.params.id); this.setState({ crime }) } render() { const { crime } = this.state; console.log(crime) return (

CRIME DETAILS

OUTCOMES

{crime.outcomes.map(outcome => ( ) )};
ID Category Month Person ID
{outcome.id} {outcome.category} {outcome.date_1} {outcome.person_id}

Developer: Pampanga state agricultural university ? BS. Information and technology students @2017 Credits: boostrap v4.

); } } export default CrimeDetails;
